Irish Highlights | Trafalgar Tours | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Irish Highlights 7 days | Dublin roundtrip Embark on a captivating roundtrip from Dublin, immersing yourself in the rich tapestry of Irish culture and history. Begin your journey by discovering the exquisite craftsmanship of Waterford crystal, a symbol of Ireland's artistic heritage. Then, channel your inner storyteller at Blarney Castle, where kissing the famous Blarney Stone bestows upon you the legendary 'gift of the gab'. As you traverse the scenic landscapes of the Ring of Kerry, you'll be enchanted by its rugged beauty and timeless charm. Along the way, delve into the poignant history of the Irish famine, gaining insight into this pivotal chapter of Ireland's past. Finally, stand in awe at the majestic Cliffs of Moher, where the sheer cliffs plunge into the vast expanse of the Atlantic Ocean. Throughout your journey, you'll be captivated by the allure of Ireland's iconic landmarks and the warmth of its people. From the intricate craftsmanship of Waterford crystal to the breathtaking vistas of the Ring of Kerry, each moment promises to be a memorable experience filled with discovery and wonder. Deal Details Travel Dates Various dates in 2024 & 2025 Priced From $2,965 per person Enquire Now Embark on a captivating roundtrip from Dublin, immersing yourself in the rich tapestry of Irish culture and history. Begin your journey by discovering the exquisite craftsmanship of Waterford crystal, a symbol of Ireland's artistic heritage. Then, channel your inner storyteller at Blarney Castle, where kissing the famous Blarney Stone bestows upon you the legendary 'gift of the gab'. As you traverse the scenic landscapes of the Ring of Kerry, you'll be enchanted by its rugged beauty and timeless charm. Along the way, delve into the poignant history of the Irish famine, gaining insight into this pivotal chapter of Ireland's past. Finally, stand in awe at the majestic Cliffs of Moher, where the sheer cliffs plunge into the vast expanse of the Atlantic Ocean. Throughout your journey, you'll be captivated by the allure of Ireland's iconic landmarks and the warmth of its people. From the intricate craftsmanship of Waterford crystal to the breathtaking vistas of the Ring of Kerry, each moment promises to be a memorable experience filled with discovery and wonder. Inclusions An expert Travel Director and professional Driver Cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted All porterage and restaurant gratuities All hotel tips, charges and local taxes Breakfast daily and up to half of your evening meals Must-see sightseeing and surprise extras Audio headsets for flexible sightseeing Luxury air-conditioned coach with Wi-Fi in most countries or alternative transportation (such as rail journeys) Ferry across the Shannon estuary Optional Experiences and free time On occasion, hotels of similar standard and location may be utilised. Itinerary Day 1 Welcome to the Emerald Isle Day 2 Onwards to Galway and Limerick Day 3 Experience the Iconic Cliffs of Moher and on to Killarney Day 4 A Scenic Day on the Ring of Kerry Day 5 Explore Blarney and Journey to Waterford Day 6 Through County Wicklow's Countryside to Dublin Day 7 Farewell Ireland Highlights Explore Dublin with a Local Specialist Discover Galway, Limerick and Waterford Visit Bunratty Folk Park, the Cliffs of Moher, Blarney to kiss the stone and gain the 'gift of the gab', the Crystal Showroom at Waterford and the famine ship in New Ross View St. Patrick's Cathedral in Dublin and King John's Castle in Limerick See the Cathedral of Galway and St. Mary's Cathedral in Limerick Scenic Cruise across the Shannon Estuary Scenic Drive of the Ring of Kerry Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy or family share where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, a credit card processing fee applies. World Travellers reserve the right to correct any errors or omissions at any time. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
